rationale: 'highly pathogenic' is used as a technical term before the virus name 'avian influenza'.
statement_text: A new case of highly pathogenic avian influenza has been detected at a poultry farm in Australia's southeastern Victoria state, officials said on Thursday, a day after the country reported its first human case of the virus and also a strain on an egg farm.

rationale: 'detected' and 'reported' are neutral verbs. 'highly pathogenic' is technical.
statement_text: A new case of highly pathogenic avian influenza has been detected at a poultry farm in Australia's southeastern Victoria state, officials said on Thursday, a day after the country reported its first human case of the virus and also a strain on an egg farm.

rationale: 'has been detected' and 'reported' are plain outcome verbs, not moderate verbs from the specified list.
